    publications

    Books and Book Chapters

    1. Language-Guided Visual Recognition
      – Mohamed Elhoseiny, Yizhe Zhu*, Ahmed Elgammal
      – Applied Cloud Deep Semantic Recognition, Chapter 5, 2018 [link] </p>

    2017

    1. A Multilayer-Based Framework for Online Background Subtraction with Freely Moving Cameras
      – Yizhe Zhu, Ahmed Elgammal,
      – International Conference on Computer Vision, ICCV 2017.
    2. Link the head to the “beak”: Zero Shot Learning from Noisy Text Description at Part Precision
      – Mohamed Elhoseiny, Yizhe Zhu*, Han Zhang, Ahmed Elgammal (contributed equally),
      – IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, CVPR 2017.

    2018

    1. CU-Net: Coupled U-Nets
      – Zhiqiang Tang, Xi Peng, Shijie Geng, Yizhe Zhu, Dimitris Metaxas,
      – British Machine Vision Conference, (BMVC Oral) 2018.
    2. A Generative Adversarial Approach for Zero-Shot Learning from Noisy Texts
      – Yizhe Zhu, Mohamed Elhoseiny, Bingchen Liu, Xi Peng, Ahmed Elgammal,
      – IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition, (CVPR) 2018.

    2019

    1. Semantic-Guided Multi-Attention Localization for Zero-Shot Learning
      – Yizhe Zhu, Jianwen Xie, Zhiqiang Tang, Xi Peng , Ahmed Elgammal,
      – Thirty-third Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems, (NeurIPS) 2019.
    2. Learning Feature-to-Feature Translator by Alternating Back-Propagation for Zero-Shot Learning
      – Yizhe Zhu, Jianwen Xie, Bingchen Liu, Ahmed Elgammal
      – International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV) 2019
    3. AdaTransform: Adaptive Data Transformation
      – Zhiqiang Tang, Xi Peng , Tingfeng Li, Yizhe Zhu, Dimitris N Metaxas
      – International Conference on Computer Vision (ICCV Oral) 2019

    2020

    1. S3VAE: Self-Supervised Sequential VAE for Representation Disentanglement and Data Generation
      – Yizhe Zhu, Martin Renqiang Min, Asim Kadav, Hans Peter Graf
      – IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2020  
    2. Federated Adversarial Domain Adaptation
      – Xingchao Peng, Zijun Huang, Yizhe Zhu, Kate Saenko
      – International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR) 2020  
    3. OOGAN: Disentangling GAN with One-Hot Sampling and Orthogonal Regularization
      – Bingchen Liu, Yizhe Zhu, Zuohui Fu, Gerard de Melo, Ahmed Elgammal
      – The Thirty-Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) 2020  

    2021

    1. Towards Faster and Stabilized GAN Training for High-fidelity Few-shot Image Synthesis
      – Bingchen Liu, Yizhe Zhu, Kunpeng Song, Ahmed Elgammal
      –International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR) 2021  
    2. Self-Supervised Sketch-to-Image Synthesis
      – Bingchen Liu, Yizhe Zhu, Kunpeng Song, Ahmed Elgammal
      – The Thirty-Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) 2021  
    3. TIME: Text and Image Mutual-Translation Adversarial Networks
      – Bingchen Liu, Kunpeng Song, Yizhe Zhu, Gerard de Melo, Ahmed Elgammal
      – The Thirty-Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI) 2021  

    2022

    1. Magicvideo: Efficient video generation with latent diffusion models
      – Daquan Zhou, Weimin Wang, Hanshu Yan, Weiwei Lv, Yizhe Zhu, Jiashi Feng ,
      –arXiv preprint arXiv:2211.11018  

    2023

    1. Shifted diffusion for text-to-image generation
      – Yufan Zhou, Bingchen Liu, Yizhe Zhu, Xiao Yang, Changyou Chen, Jinhui Xu
      –IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Patter (CVPR) 2023
